# Aurora of Hope
## Scripture
"Arise, shine, for your light has come, and the glory of the Lord rises upon you." - Isaiah 60:1

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the breathtaking display of the Northern Lights, we are reminded of the awe-inspiring glory of God. The dancing colors and swirling patterns of the aurora borealis evoke a sense of wonder and majesty, much like the glory of the Lord rising upon us. Just as the Northern Lights illuminate the dark winter skies, God's glory can shine brightly in our lives, even in the midst of challenges and difficulties. The prophet Isaiah's words invite us to arise and shine, for the light of God's presence has come, and His glory is rising upon us.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we marvel at the beauty of the Northern Lights, we are reminded of Your glorious presence in our lives. Help us to arise and shine, reflecting Your light to a world in need of hope. May Your glory rise upon us, illuminating our paths and guiding us through life's journey. Fill us with wonder, awe, and reverence for Your majesty, and may we be beacons of Your love and light to those around us. Amen.
